basics.name: Thomas Broomfield
basics.summary: A highly experienced full stack engineer with a love for leading teams and building products.

work.name: Powerful low code application builder
work.summary: Leading the development of the Assembler low-code application builder. Development of products and projects for government, enterprise and startups.
highlights: V8 Isolates for sandboxed code execution
Programmatic custom application compilation (esbuild, svelte, rollup)
Kubernetes (+ custom operators), bare metal and cloud deployments

work.name: PwC Australia
work.summary: Head of development for a wide range of technical ventures across tax, legal, accounting, consulting and advisory.
highlights: V8 Isolates for sandboxed code execution
Programmatic custom application compilation (esbuild, svelte, rollup)
Kubernetes (+ custom operators), bare metal and cloud deployments

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
